import axios from "axios" export default function UsersList({style, users, set_new_users}) { function removeUser(e){ let data = Array.from(e.target.parentElement.parentElement.querySelectorAll("td")).map(item=>item.textContent)[0] let id = e.target.parentElement.parentElement.id let url = String(window.host_addr+"/api/delete/user/"+id) console.log(url) axios.get(url, { mode: 'no-cors', headers: { 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*', 'Content-Type': 'application/json',} }) setupdate(true) } return (
{users.map((person) => ( ))}
First Name Last Name Edit
{person.first_name} {person.last_name} Delete
) }
